thread.title: 5 Brits killed as Canadian whale watching boat capsizes
thread.title_full: 5 Brits killed as Canadian whale watching boat capsizes

title: 5 Brits killed as Canadian whale watching boat capsizes
text: [news] 17:04 I was in Tofino where this happened a couple of months ago. Such a small community, all very friendly - it will have hit them hard. It's probably the friendliest, most laid back, welcoming place I've ever been. Think Devon surfer village, mixed with tiny Scottish fishing village and you're about there. We stayed at Jamies Rainforest Inn, the guy owns a lot of businesses in the area not just the whale watching. Given the speed of these boats I'm assuming it hit hidden rocks at high speed, it certainly is shown next to rocks in the images (though could have drifted there). Real shame, these guys are usually massively devoted to the job and very professional.
